page.title: 05TRADE
page.content: {Clothes shopping}is usually done out of the area of Sandbach in places like Crewe,Hanley(Stoke-on-Trent),Northwich ,Winsford and Manchester.Some people shop in Sandbach,many go to the market (every Thursday)because the choice of clothes shops in Sandbach is limited, and the prices of clothes on the Market are considerably cheaper. {Sandbach market}is a very large and old established market and it attracts a lot of people into Sandbach.It is organised by Congleton Borough Council every Thursday.There are many kinds of stalls selling fruit,vegetables drapery,clothes,toys,bags,books,cards, rugs,electrical appliances and leather goods.Some stallholders on the market are local people,but some travel from places all over the country,like Manchester and Birmingham to attend the market on a regular basis.
